nodes.text: The shortwave remote control hack was a short-range control unit used by Gorga Desilijic Aarrpo. During the Clone Wars, the Hutt crime lord used this device in an attempt to disrupt the Goldskin Parade. The device allowed Gorga to remotely take control of a Separatist Heavy Speeder which was captured by the Galactic Republic after the liberation of Nothoiin.
